channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Pirate Treasure: When Captain Squid leaves his treasure map in the Little Kingdom, Redbeard the Elf Pirate leads Ben, Holly and Nanny Plum on a treasure hunt.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston Goes to the Vet: Ben Elf and his parents are going on holiday in the elf truck but Gaston the Ladybird has swallowed the car keys.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam and Kit look for a mysterious bird in 'The Puzzle of the Plummeting Eggs', then 'The Missing Mole Rat Princess', the duo tracks down a royal mole rat who left her underground palace. (S1, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora shows the twins a baila folklorico dancer who comes to life in 'Tiny Dancer', then in 'The Sleepy Sun', the sun won't set because it can't fall asleep! Dora needs to find Pillow Cloud. (S1, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger swipes Francois' shoes in 'Pups Save a Water Walker', then in 'Pups Save a Windsurfer', a long lost letter inspires Ms. Marjorie to visit an old surfing buddy. (S8, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Rainy Day Game: It is raining outside so Peppa and George have to stay indoors. While they wait for the rain to stop, Daddy Pig teaches them a fun game.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Rabbit's Bump: Mummy Rabbit comes to visit with a big tummy. Everyone is excited to find out there is a baby rabbit inside, but they are in for an even bigger surprise.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Pedro Pony spends the day just like in the Wild West in 'Pedro The Cowboy', and then in 'Peppa and George's Garden', Grandpa Pig brings some seeds for Peppa and George to grow a garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr. Curry wants to become a ranger leader in 'Paddington's Nature Club', then in 'Paddington's not Himself', Paddington has a fall and loses his climbing confidence - what can he do? (S2, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Jonathan and Paddington find a bottled map in 'Paddington's Treasure Hunt', then in 'Paddington's Taste of Italy', Mr. Gruber has always wanted to go to Italy, so Paddington tries to help. (S2, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Big Bad Barry: King Thistle wants fish for dinner, so he goes out fishing with Mr Elf, Ben and Holly on Mr Elf's boat. Mr Elf tells them a story about the biggest, baddest fish ever - Big Bad Barry.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's Birthday: King Thistle does not want to get any older so decides that no one must celebrate his birthday. But all of the Little Kingdom has been waiting to celebrate.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Wand Factory: Holly breaks her wand and must go to the Wand Factory, at the bottom of the Great Elf Tree, to get it fixed.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Camping Out: Holly is going on a camping trip with Ben and his mum and dad, but they are soon joined by annoying Mr Gnome, who is always hungry and sings silly songs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: London: Madame Gazelle takes the whole class to London for the day and get a tour by The Queen herself.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Simple Science: While the playground is getting rebuilt, Daddy Pig teaches the children some simple science.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: School Project: It's school project time for Peppa and her friends which means they have to build castles and bring them into playgroup.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Police: Police Officer Panda and Police Officer Squirrel have come to teach Peppa and her friends all about bicycle safety.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Playgroup Garden; Bowling; Swimming Lesson; Rock Pools; Recycling; The Boat Pond; The Traffic Jam; Bedtime: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Swimming Lesson; Rock Pools; Recycling; The Boat Pond; The Traffic Jam; Bedtime: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A superfood cake creates some super heroes in 'Paddington's Hero Squad', then in 'Paddington's Knightly Quest', Paddington wants to become a Knight; but needs to complete heroic quests! (S3, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Windsor Gardens has two new heroes in 'Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant', then in 'Paddington and the Accidental Hero', Jonathan is hailed a hero after saving a rare gnome. (S3, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Judy finds her inner hero on a camping trip in 'Paddington's Race Against the Storm', then in 'Paddington's Super Snail', Paddington befriends a speedy snail with a heroic future ahead. (S3, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington and Robot Paddingtron enjoy being heroes in 'Paddington and Paddingtron's Heroic Day', then in 'Paddington's Heroic Non-Stop Adventure', Paddington discovers how to be calm. (S3, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses; Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married; Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day; Party Bus: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups and the Werepuppy!: Rocky goes missing at Uncle Otis's cabin, and the PAW Patrol needs to solve the mystery of the Werepuppy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a Sleepwalking Mayor: It's Cowboy Day at the Wingnuts Dude Ranch. Mayor Goodway tries to brave the hazards of the ranch all while sleepwalking.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks the mystery hero doing good deeds in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington and the Unlikely Hero', then in 'Paddington Needs a Hero', Paddington gets stuck in an igloo! (S3, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: There's a special photo wall in the park in 'Paddington's Favourite Hero', then in 'Paddington And The Skateboarder', Mateo helps Paddington to become a heroic skateboarder. (S3, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A rockslide traps a Bat Family inside their cave in 'Pups Save a Bat Family', then in 'Pups Save a Mud Monster', Snowboarders get stuck on a broken chair lift while a monster is wild! (S6, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Mini Patrol and the Pups race the rain in 'Pups Save the Chalk Art', then in 'Pups Save the Hot Potato', Farmer Al and Yumi's garden is full of holes and a unique potato is missing. (S7, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups help Grandpa bowl a strike in 'The Crew Builds A Bowling Alley', then in 'The Crew Builds A Superbloom Path', a flower-friendly footpath saves the day. (S2, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps the twins see the rainbow in 'Rainbow's Lost Colours', then in 'Boots' Rubber Band Ball', Boots has to retrieve his ball after it lands in Cynthia the Centipede's yard. (S1, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Greedy and Storm take a competition too far in 'Waffles and Punishment', and in 'Never Wake a Sleeping Sorcerer', Gargamel sleepwalks into the Smurfs' Village, who make the most of it. (S2, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: A Knight's Tail: Gabby the Bold and Pandy the Purr-owd are Knights in Training, and head into the dollhouse for the Royal Knighting Ceremony. But someone's locked King Catnip in the tower! (S1, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Cake-tastrophe: When a hungry Crusher accidentally turns the baker truck's baker bots to messy mode, they sprout wheels and drive away! Now it's up to AJ and Blaze to track them all down. (S1, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Pups must save Rocky and Humdinger in 'Pups Save a Box Fort', then in 'Pups Save Travelin' Travis From Really Big Bill!', Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island. (S8, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Rocky Kitty runs away to join the Paw Patrol in 'Pups Take in a Runaway Kitty', then in 'Pups Save the Cheese Goat' Digi and Tal confuse goat cheese for a cheese goat. (S10, ep 25).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Pet Competition: There is a pet competition at playgroup, and everyone has brought in their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but finds it hard to choose the best pet.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Spider Web: Mummy Pig finds a spider in the house and orders Daddy Pig to get rid of it. Mr Skinny-Legs is set free in the garden, where he can spin all the webs he likes, wherever he likes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Noisy Night; Wishing Well: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle is leaving (don't worry, not really) in 'Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party', and then in 'The Queen', Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's award for industry, for all the work she does.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: A fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a 'Desert Island', and then in 'Perfume', Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Granny and Granpapa: A magical card arrives in the Little Kingdom, inviting everyone to a party at Granny and Granpapa Thistle's castle in the clouds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's Elf and Fairy Party: Lucy celebrates her birthday with an Elf and Fairy party and Ben, Holly and friends are invited.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Planet Bong - Part 1: Aliens arrive from Planet Bong to ask the Wise Old Elf to restore their hot and sandy planet by restoring all the plants.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Planet Bong - Part 2: The elves and fairies arrive at Planet Bong and meet The Great Leader, the aliens and their pets.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Queen Bakes Cakes: A cake sale is organised to mend the magic school, but Queen Thistle is baking and no-one can eat her cakes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Journey to the Centre of the Earth: Naughty Daisy and Poppy magic their teacher, Mrs Fotheringill to the centre of the Earth, so Granpapa Thistle leads Ben and Holly on a rescue mission.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The pups save Humdinger from falling space debris in 'Pups Stop the Falling Space Jun', then in 'Pups Stop the Giant Cuckoo', Humdinger's Cuckoo Clock goes out of control. (S10, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Marshall performs some Dino dentistry in 'Pups Save a Sore Dino', and then in 'Pups Save the Triceratops Tag-Alongs', a sightseeing expedition quickly turns into a wild Dino ride! (S7, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Cupcake Tree: When the Gabby Cats get stuck in the leaves of an overgrown cupcake tree, it's up to Gabby, Pandy and cupcake-expert Cakey to work together to save CatRat. (S2, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The school roof has a leak again, so the children raise money for a new roof in 'Children's Fete', then in 'The Aquarium', Goldie the Goldfish is feeling lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: George's Racing Car; The Little Boat: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: Travels with Terence: Terence breaks his tyre tread, Thomas takes him to get fixed and explore some of the island. But Terence's off-track energy isn't quite fit for more orderly places. (S27, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Sandpit: Peppa and her friends are building a desert island, in the sandpit. They add a forest, a lake, houses, and shops. It's all going very well until George and Richard's dinosaurs turn up.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Night Animals: It is night time at Grandpa and Granny Pig's house, Peppa and George have stayed up late to help hunt for slugs and snails. But what other night animals will they find.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Justa is still searching for his calling in 'The Talented Justa Smurf', then in 'Smurf, Yes Smurf!', Brainy uses a potion to finally get the Village to obey his every whim. (S2, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The Mystery on the Monsoon Express: Animal detectives Sam and Kit collect all the clues while searching for the slithering suspect who bit an express train's engineer. (S1, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots get a baby back to its mama in 'The Little Axolotl', and in 'Bubble Trouble', Dora must save the Big Red Chicken who floats away in a bubble right before the big talent show. (S1, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog in 'Pups Save a Show Jumper', then in 'Pups Save the Salmon', the pups must help salmon get to the ocean, and Alex gets stuck on top of a dam. (S8, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger becomes HumCatDingerMan in 'Pups and Cats Save HumCatDingerMan', then in 'Pups Save A Turbot Tournament', the pups must save Tilly during the Turbot Tournament. (S10, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups help a baby deer get home in 'The Crew Raises A Runway', then in 'The Crew Builds A Giant Skateboard', Auntie Crane and River go on a wild ride. (S2, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Truck Rangers: Blaze and his friends have joined a scouting club where trucks earn badges for their accomplishments. Crusher's selfish scouting lands everyone in a heap of trouble! (S1, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Dollhouse Detectives: When things start to mysteriously disappear around the dollhouse, Gabby and Pandy play detectives. (S2, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Redbeard's Rainbow: Rainbows are a pirate's best friend - if you're looking for a pot of gold. But, if like Captain Squid you are hiding treasure, then rainbows are a pirate's worst enemy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Fox Cubs: There is a new fox cub leader in The Little Kingdom - Nanny Plum. But whilst trying to earn their adventure badges the fox cubs find themselves stuck at the top of a mountain.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Friendly rhinos gather at the Watering Hole in 'The Riddle of Raging Rhinos', and in 'The Trouble in the Tundra', Sam and Kit are on the case when the Mice Squad goes missing in the Arctic. (S1, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora gets baby crocs to sleep in 'Croc-A-Bye Baby', The Troll appears in 'Wanna Empanada?', Boots tries new boots in 'if The Boot Fits', and the twins have problems with a 'Pinata Party'. (S1, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Mighty Pups must stop Sweetie and her new powers in 'Mighty Pups Stop the Mighty Queen', then in 'Mighty Pups Stop the Hiccups', Nano gets the hiccups and duplicates. (S10, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Flying on Holiday: The Pig family are preparing to go on holiday, Peppa and George pack their favourite toys and Granny and Grandpa are left to look after Goldie the Fish.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Holiday House: Peppa and her family have landed in Italy, where they discover another language. Daddy Pig finds driving hard. Peppa rings Granny and Grandpa Pig to check on Goldie the Fish.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Holiday in the Sun; End of the Holiday: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr. Curry's favourite radio show is cancelled in 'Paddington's Radio Show', then in 'Paddington's Butler', Mr. Curry is Paddington's butler for the day - but he prefers giving orders! (S2, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: It's the Windsor Gardens pet show in 'Paddington becomes a Talent Show Judge', and in 'Paddington Keeps Up With The Kamalis', playing with neighbours is more fun than trying to outdo them! (S2, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Dinner Party: Snooty King and Queen Marigold invite themselves round for dinner to King and Queen Thistle's castle to sample Nanny Plum's cooking. Nanny tries hard to cook special modern food.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Woodpecker: King Thistle is bored and takes up the hobby of bird watching. Using his magic bird book, the King is pleased when another creature makes a nest in the Royal Castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Rocket: After seeing a toy Elf rocket, the King orders a real rocket to fly to the moon. Elf honour is at stake and the Elves make a rocket in record time! (Part 1 of 2).
